# didChange()

**Instance Method**

Returns a publisher that emits values when a KVO-compliant property changes.

## Declaration

```swift
func didChange() -> Publishers.Map<NSObject.KeyValueObservingPublisher<Subject, Value>, Void>
```

## Return Value

A key-value observing publisher.
